instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3330-B slow charging
threads.message:
Hi there

I have in my posession a 2012 MacBook Pro A1286 (Board 820-3330-B) that has been randomly shutting off while on power and on battery. The battery has been replaced. I have gone through and all the power lines seem good. The only anomaly is that the charger is pulling 18.5V @ 380ma while the machine is powered off and takes approx 12 hours to charge a battery fully. This is a new battery. What could be causing this slow charge?

threads.title: 820-3330-B slow charging
threads.message:
"This is a new battery"
New chinese battery???
Try an old known good battery...

threads.title: 820-3330-B slow charging
threads.message: I removed, reinstalled and reconnected the battery and now its charging normally.
